name: The Fool (itch)
description:
CONTROLS: 
--------------------------
use WASD or ARROWS to move 
SPACE to jump
R to restart level

----------------------------

SEE MY LATEST COMMENT!

The Fool is an action game where you cant attack. Because of this you will have to lure your enemies into killing each other. 

We planned on adding spells and environmental stuff that would allow you to manipulate the enemies further, but didnt have the time...
